00034 Session::Session(const SessionParams& params_)
00035 : params(params_),
00036   tile_manager(params.progressive, params.samples, params.tile_size, params.min_size)
00037 {
00038     device_use_gl = ((params.device.type != DEVICE_CPU) && !params.background);
00039 
00040     device = Device::create(params.device, params.background, params.threads);
00041     buffers = new RenderBuffers(device);
00042     display = new DisplayBuffer(device);
00043 
00044     session_thread = NULL;
00045     scene = NULL;
00046 
00047     start_time = 0.0;
00048     reset_time = 0.0;
00049     preview_time = 0.0;
00050     paused_time = 0.0;
00051     sample = 0;
00052 
00053     delayed_reset.do_reset = false;
00054     delayed_reset.samples = 0;
00055 
00056     display_outdated = false;
00057     gpu_draw_ready = false;
00058     gpu_need_tonemap = false;
00059     pause = false;
00060     kernels_loaded = false;
00061 }
00062 
00063 Session::~Session()
00064 {
00065     if(session_thread) {
00066         progress.set_cancel("Exiting");
00067 
00068         gpu_need_tonemap = false;
00069         gpu_need_tonemap_cond.notify_all();
00070 
00071         {
00072             thread_scoped_lock pause_lock(pause_mutex);
00073             pause = false;
00074         }
00075         pause_cond.notify_all();
00076 
00077         wait();
00078     }
00079 
00080     if(params.output_path != "") {
00081         tonemap();
00082 
00083         progress.set_status("Writing Image", params.output_path);
00084         display->write(device, params.output_path);
00085     }
00086 
00087     delete buffers;
00088     delete display;
00089     delete scene;
00090     delete device;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void Session::start()
00094 {
00095     session_thread = new thread(function_bind(&Session::run, this));
00096 }
00097 
00098 bool Session::ready_to_reset()
00099 {
00100     double dt = time_dt() - reset_time;
00101 
00102     if(!display_outdated)
00103         return (dt > params.reset_timeout);
00104     else
00105         return (dt > params.cancel_timeout);
00106 }

00108 /* GPU Session */
00109 
00110 void Session::reset_gpu(BufferParams& buffer_params, int samples)
00111 {
00112     /* block for buffer acces and reset immediately. we can't do this
00113        in the thread, because we need to allocate an OpenGL buffer, and
00114        that only works in the main thread */
00115     thread_scoped_lock display_lock(display->mutex);
00116     thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00117 
00118     display_outdated = true;
00119     reset_time = time_dt();
00120 
00121     reset_(buffer_params, samples);
00122 
00123     gpu_need_tonemap = false;
00124     gpu_need_tonemap_cond.notify_all();
00125 
00126     pause_cond.notify_all();
00127 }
00128 
00129 bool Session::draw_gpu(BufferParams& buffer_params)
00130 {
00131     /* block for buffer access */
00132     thread_scoped_lock display_lock(display->mutex);
00133 
00134     /* first check we already rendered something */
00135     if(gpu_draw_ready) {
00136         /* then verify the buffers have the expected size, so we don't
00137            draw previous results in a resized window */
00138         if(!buffer_params.modified(display->params)) {
00139             /* for CUDA we need to do tonemapping still, since we can
00140                only access GL buffers from the main thread */
00141             if(gpu_need_tonemap) {
00142                 thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00143                 tonemap();
00144                 gpu_need_tonemap = false;
00145                 gpu_need_tonemap_cond.notify_all();
00146             }
00147 
00148             display->draw(device);
00149 
00150             if(display_outdated && (time_dt() - reset_time) > params.text_timeout)
00151                 return false;
00152 
00153             return true;
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     return false;
00158 }
00159 
00160 void Session::run_gpu()
00161 {
00162     start_time = time_dt();
00163     reset_time = time_dt();
00164     paused_time = 0.0;
00165 
00166     if(!params.background)
00167         progress.set_start_time(start_time + paused_time);
00168 
00169     while(!progress.get_cancel()) {
00170         /* advance to next tile */
00171         bool no_tiles = !tile_manager.next();
00172 
00173         if(params.background) {
00174             /* if no work left and in background mode, we can stop immediately */
00175             if(no_tiles) {
00176                 progress.set_status("Finished");
00177                 break;
00178             }
00179         }
00180         else {
00181             /* if in interactive mode, and we are either paused or done for now,
00182                wait for pause condition notify to wake up again */
00183             thread_scoped_lock pause_lock(pause_mutex);
00184 
00185             if(pause || no_tiles) {
00186                 update_status_time(pause, no_tiles);
00187 
00188                 while(1) {
00189                     double pause_start = time_dt();
00190                     pause_cond.wait(pause_lock);
00191                     paused_time += time_dt() - pause_start;
00192 
00193                     if(!params.background)
00194                         progress.set_start_time(start_time + paused_time);
00195 
00196                     update_status_time(pause, no_tiles);
00197                     progress.set_update();
00198 
00199                     if(!pause)
00200                         break;
00201                 }
00202             }
00203 
00204             if(progress.get_cancel())
00205                 break;
00206         }
00207 
00208         if(!no_tiles) {
00209             /* update scene */
00210             update_scene();
00211 
00212             if(device->error_message() != "")
00213                 progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00214 
00215             if(progress.get_cancel())
00216                 break;
00217         }
00218 
00219         if(!no_tiles) {
00220             /* buffers mutex is locked entirely while rendering each
00221                sample, and released/reacquired on each iteration to allow
00222                reset and draw in between */
00223             thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00224 
00225             /* update status and timing */
00226             update_status_time();
00227 
00228             /* path trace */
00229             foreach(Tile& tile, tile_manager.state.tiles) {
00230                 path_trace(tile);
00231 
00232                 device->task_wait();
00233 
00234                 if(device->error_message() != "")
00235                     progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00236 
00237                 if(progress.get_cancel())
00238                     break;
00239             }
00240 
00241             /* update status and timing */
00242             update_status_time();
00243 
00244             gpu_need_tonemap = true;
00245             gpu_draw_ready = true;
00246             progress.set_update();
00247 
00248             /* wait for tonemap */
00249             if(!params.background) {
00250                 while(gpu_need_tonemap) {
00251                     if(progress.get_cancel())
00252                         break;
00253 
00254                     gpu_need_tonemap_cond.wait(buffers_lock);
00255                 }
00256             }
00257 
00258             if(device->error_message() != "")
00259                 progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00260 
00261             if(progress.get_cancel())
00262                 break;
00263         }
00264     }
00265 }

00267 /* CPU Session */
00268 
00269 void Session::reset_cpu(BufferParams& buffer_params, int samples)
00270 {
00271     thread_scoped_lock reset_lock(delayed_reset.mutex);
00272 
00273     display_outdated = true;
00274     reset_time = time_dt();
00275 
00276     delayed_reset.params = buffer_params;
00277     delayed_reset.samples = samples;
00278     delayed_reset.do_reset = true;
00279     device->task_cancel();
00280 
00281     pause_cond.notify_all();
00282 }
00283 
00284 bool Session::draw_cpu(BufferParams& buffer_params)
00285 {
00286     thread_scoped_lock display_lock(display->mutex);
00287 
00288     /* first check we already rendered something */
00289     if(display->draw_ready()) {
00290         /* then verify the buffers have the expected size, so we don't
00291            draw previous results in a resized window */
00292         if(!buffer_params.modified(display->params)) {
00293             display->draw(device);
00294 
00295             if(display_outdated && (time_dt() - reset_time) > params.text_timeout)
00296                 return false;
00297 
00298             return true;
00299         }
00300     }
00301 
00302     return false;
00303 }
00304 
00305 void Session::run_cpu()
00306 {
00307     {
00308         /* reset once to start */
00309         thread_scoped_lock reset_lock(delayed_reset.mutex);
00310         thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00311         thread_scoped_lock display_lock(display->mutex);
00312 
00313         reset_(delayed_reset.params, delayed_reset.samples);
00314         delayed_reset.do_reset = false;
00315     }
00316 
00317     while(!progress.get_cancel()) {
00318         /* advance to next tile */
00319         bool no_tiles = !tile_manager.next();
00320         bool need_tonemap = false;
00321 
00322         if(params.background) {
00323             /* if no work left and in background mode, we can stop immediately */
00324             if(no_tiles) {
00325                 progress.set_status("Finished");
00326                 break;
00327             }
00328         }
00329         else {
00330             /* if in interactive mode, and we are either paused or done for now,
00331                wait for pause condition notify to wake up again */
00332             thread_scoped_lock pause_lock(pause_mutex);
00333 
00334             if(pause || no_tiles) {
00335                 update_status_time(pause, no_tiles);
00336 
00337                 while(1) {
00338                     double pause_start = time_dt();
00339                     pause_cond.wait(pause_lock);
00340                     paused_time += time_dt() - pause_start;
00341 
00342                     if(!params.background)
00343                         progress.set_start_time(start_time + paused_time);
00344 
00345                     update_status_time(pause, no_tiles);
00346                     progress.set_update();
00347 
00348                     if(!pause)
00349                         break;
00350                 }
00351             }
00352 
00353             if(progress.get_cancel())
00354                 break;
00355         }
00356 
00357         if(!no_tiles) {
00358             /* buffers mutex is locked entirely while rendering each
00359                sample, and released/reacquired on each iteration to allow
00360                reset and draw in between */
00361             thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00362 
00363             /* update scene */
00364             update_scene();
00365 
00366             if(device->error_message() != "")
00367                 progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00368 
00369             if(progress.get_cancel())
00370                 break;
00371 
00372             /* update status and timing */
00373             update_status_time();
00374 
00375             /* path trace */
00376             foreach(Tile& tile, tile_manager.state.tiles)
00377                 path_trace(tile);
00378 
00379             /* update status and timing */
00380             update_status_time();
00381 
00382             if(!params.background)
00383                 need_tonemap = true;
00384 
00385             if(device->error_message() != "")
00386                 progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00387         }
00388 
00389         device->task_wait();
00390 
00391         {
00392             thread_scoped_lock reset_lock(delayed_reset.mutex);
00393             thread_scoped_lock buffers_lock(buffers->mutex);
00394             thread_scoped_lock display_lock(display->mutex);
00395 
00396             if(delayed_reset.do_reset) {
00397                 /* reset rendering if request from main thread */
00398                 delayed_reset.do_reset = false;
00399                 reset_(delayed_reset.params, delayed_reset.samples);
00400             }
00401             else if(need_tonemap) {
00402                 /* tonemap only if we do not reset, we don't we don't
00403                    want to show the result of an incomplete sample*/
00404                 tonemap();
00405             }
00406 
00407             if(device->error_message() != "")
00408                 progress.set_cancel(device->error_message());
00409         }
00410 
00411         progress.set_update();
00412     }
00413 }
00414 
00415 void Session::run()
00416 {
00417     /* load kernels */
00418     if(!kernels_loaded) {
00419         progress.set_status("Loading render kernels (may take a few minutes the first time)");
00420 
00421         if(!device->load_kernels(params.experimental)) {
00422             string message = device->error_message();
00423             if(message == "")
00424                 message = "Failed loading render kernel, see console for errors";
00425 
00426             progress.set_status("Error", message);
00427             progress.set_update();
00428             return;
00429         }
00430 
00431         kernels_loaded = true;
00432     }
00433 
00434     /* session thread loop */
00435     progress.set_status("Waiting for render to start");
00436 
00437     /* run */
00438     if(!progress.get_cancel()) {
00439         if(device_use_gl)
00440             run_gpu();
00441         else
00442             run_cpu();
00443     }
00444 
00445     /* progress update */
00446     if(progress.get_cancel())
00447         progress.set_status("Cancel", progress.get_cancel_message());
00448     else
00449         progress.set_update();
00450 }
00451 
00452 bool Session::draw(BufferParams& buffer_params)
00453 {
00454     if(device_use_gl)
00455         return draw_gpu(buffer_params);
00456     else
00457         return draw_cpu(buffer_params);
00458 }
00459 
00460 void Session::reset_(BufferParams& buffer_params, int samples)
00461 {
00462     if(buffer_params.modified(buffers->params)) {
00463         gpu_draw_ready = false;
00464         buffers->reset(device, buffer_params);
00465         display->reset(device, buffer_params);
00466     }
00467 
00468     tile_manager.reset(buffer_params, samples);
00469 
00470     start_time = time_dt();
00471     preview_time = 0.0;
00472     paused_time = 0.0;
00473     sample = 0;
00474 
00475     if(!params.background)
00476         progress.set_start_time(start_time + paused_time);
00477 }
00478 
00479 void Session::reset(BufferParams& buffer_params, int samples)
00480 {
00481     if(device_use_gl)
00482         reset_gpu(buffer_params, samples);
00483     else
00484         reset_cpu(buffer_params, samples);
00485 }
00486 
00487 void Session::set_samples(int samples)
00488 {
00489     if(samples != params.samples) {
00490         params.samples = samples;
00491         tile_manager.set_samples(samples);
00492 
00493         {
00494             thread_scoped_lock pause_lock(pause_mutex);
00495         }
00496         pause_cond.notify_all();
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00500 void Session::set_pause(bool pause_)
00501 {
00502     bool notify = false;
00503 
00504     {
00505         thread_scoped_lock pause_lock(pause_mutex);
00506 
00507         if(pause != pause_) {
00508             pause = pause_;
00509             notify = true;
00510         }
00511     }
00512 
00513     if(notify)
00514         pause_cond.notify_all();
00515 }

00517 void Session::wait()
00518 {
00519     session_thread->join();
00520     delete session_thread;
00521 
00522     session_thread = NULL;
00523 }
00524 
00525 void Session::update_scene()
00526 {
00527     thread_scoped_lock scene_lock(scene->mutex);
00528 
00529     progress.set_status("Updating Scene");
00530 
00531     /* update camera if dimensions changed for progressive render. the camera
00532        knows nothing about progressive or cropped rendering, it just gets the
00533        image dimensions passed in */
00534     Camera *cam = scene->camera;
00535     int width = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_width;
00536     int height = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_height;
00537 
00538     if(width != cam->width || height != cam->height) {
00539         cam->width = width;
00540         cam->height = height;
00541         cam->tag_update();
00542     }
00543 
00544     /* update scene */
00545     if(scene->need_update())
00546         scene->device_update(device, progress);
00547 }
00548 
00549 void Session::update_status_time(bool show_pause, bool show_done)
00550 {
00551     int sample = tile_manager.state.sample;
00552     int resolution = tile_manager.state.resolution;
00553 
00554     /* update status */
00555     string status, substatus;
00556 
00557     if(!params.progressive)
00558         substatus = "Path Tracing";
00559     else if(params.samples == INT_MAX)
00560         substatus = string_printf("Path Tracing Sample %d", sample+1);
00561     else
00562         substatus = string_printf("Path Tracing Sample %d/%d", sample+1, params.samples);
00563     
00564     if(show_pause)
00565         status = "Paused";
00566     else if(show_done)
00567         status = "Done";
00568     else
00569         status = "Rendering";
00570 
00571     progress.set_status(status, substatus);
00572 
00573     /* update timing */
00574     if(preview_time == 0.0 && resolution == 1)
00575         preview_time = time_dt();
00576     
00577     double sample_time = (sample == 0)? 0.0: (time_dt() - preview_time - paused_time)/(sample);
00578 
00579     /* negative can happen when we pause a bit before rendering, can discard that */
00580     if(preview_time < 0.0) preview_time = 0.0;
00581 
00582     progress.set_sample(sample + 1, sample_time);
00583 }
00584 
00585 void Session::path_trace(Tile& tile)
00586 {
00587     /* add path trace task */
00588     DeviceTask task(DeviceTask::PATH_TRACE);
00589 
00590     task.x = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_x + tile.x;
00591     task.y = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_y + tile.y;
00592     task.w = tile.w;
00593     task.h = tile.h;
00594     task.buffer = buffers->buffer.device_pointer;
00595     task.rng_state = buffers->rng_state.device_pointer;
00596     task.sample = tile_manager.state.sample;
00597     task.resolution = tile_manager.state.resolution;
00598     tile_manager.state.buffer.get_offset_stride(task.offset, task.stride);
00599 
00600     device->task_add(task);
00601 }
00602 
00603 void Session::tonemap()
00604 {
00605     /* add tonemap task */
00606     DeviceTask task(DeviceTask::TONEMAP);
00607 
00608     task.x = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_x;
00609     task.y = tile_manager.state.buffer.full_y;
00610     task.w = tile_manager.state.buffer.width;
00611     task.h = tile_manager.state.buffer.height;
00612     task.rgba = display->rgba.device_pointer;
00613     task.buffer = buffers->buffer.device_pointer;
00614     task.sample = tile_manager.state.sample;
00615     task.resolution = tile_manager.state.resolution;
00616     tile_manager.state.buffer.get_offset_stride(task.offset, task.stride);
00617 
00618     if(task.w > 0 && task.h > 0) {
00619         device->task_add(task);
00620         device->task_wait();
00621 
00622         /* set display to new size */
00623         display->draw_set(task.w, task.h);
00624     }
00625 
00626     display_outdated = false;
00627 }
